'''Orlan Peddler''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A Rauataian native, originating from a territory conquered long ago by the kingdom, the peddler trades wares as a citizen of the Great Kingdom. She's never known anything else and grew accustomed to Rauataian rule, like her parents and grandparents. The only thing that might bother her is that the way of life Rauatai promises is slow to arrive in her homeland.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Supplies and accessories. Unique items include the [Ring of Greater Regeneration](/ringOfGreaterRegeneration/) and the [Charm of Bones](/charmOfBones/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =

|other           =
}}
